display_long_description:
-Quantum Strike (Legacy Alpha) is a Sneak Peak at what's to come Winter 2025-

Join our Community Discord to gain access to the Exclusive Pre-Release before it comes out! Details on our website

- Pre-Release: **Helmets/Rewards**, **Interactive Missions**, **Player Progression**, **Matchmaking**, ***Generative AI K2 Assistant**, **New Weapons**, **New Enhancements**, and more!  


# Defend the Quantum Realm!

The Quantum Realm is under siege, and only you can defend it! Interdimensional beings are pouring through rifts in space and time, threatening to unravel the universe. As a Guardian, your mission is to protect the realm, gather resources, and rise to power.

# **Horde Survival Mode**
Play solo or team up with up to 6 friends in **Horde Survival**, facing relentless onslaughts of enemies. Gather resources, level up, and unlock upgrades to stay ahead of the growing threat.
[media]
# **Custom Maps and PvP Battles**
Unleash your creativity by designing custom battle maps and challenging friends in intense **PvP battles**. Test your strategies and prove your dominance in dynamic, player-built arenas with up to 6 friends!

# **Loot and Gear Upgrades**
Build the ultimate loadout and become an unstoppable Guardian capable of taking on any challenge.
[media]
# **Immersive Mixed Reality**

The universe is your battleground—are you ready to take command?

# **BHaptics Integrated**

Sound/Music Producer: **Youssef Romero - Braincellzmusic**
